title: 古巨基討論區(19) 預計今年內推出《VICTORIA II》

replies.msg:
關於未來既計劃/作品 (update 19/9)

1. 音樂
廣東新碟《維多利亞 - VICTORIA I》已出
演唱會 3DVD+3CD《WE 我們古巨基世界巡迴演唱會2018 - 香港站 (3DVD + 3CD)》已出
廣東新碟《維多利亞 - VICTORIA II》預計2019年推出
- 新碟主題關於香港, 靈感源自網絡
- 落實既新碟班底係方皓玟, 林奕匡, 林夕
- 第1 plug <初心>
- 第2 plug與黃子華合唱<子華說>
- 新歌<勁揪>收錄在《維多利亞 - VICTORIA I》
- 第3 plug <太空艙>
- 第4 plug <亂世情侶>
- 新歌 <亂世情侶>合唱版
- 將陸續有派台歌
- 主唱優酷Youku、英皇娛樂聯合出品網劇《PTU機動部隊》國語版主題曲
- 有參與填詞工作

2. 演唱會及未來已知活動
11月－《古巨基我們世界巡迴演唱會Part 2 - 澳門站》(2/11)

3. 影視
- 2019年可能拍為其度身訂造以上海灘為背景的中國電視劇
- 積極計劃執導電影

replies.msg: I saw his concert live twice which was absolutely incredible and unforgettable. The first time I saw his concert with my friends we were late. I remember I said "look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was five to eight. The concert would've started by then. It was a worthwhile concert that was compelling enough to see twice. He's been strutting his stuff since he was young so don't sell him short. At the end of the last encore he bowed onstage soaking up the applause. He met with a thunderous ovation. He and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform alongside him gave a superb performance. The choreography, the stage and lighting design and the light sticks were magnificent and beyond all expectations. My friend Sam whos very career-minded has been wondering about having him endorse his company's products but he'll have to make it financially worthwhile for him. The singer is also very career-oriented who has a worthwhile job and career. I consider music performing to be a worthwhile career.
